backend/main.mo: Main backend canister implementing KYC, payout methods, and withdrawals with access control, storage mixins, and migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Defines a migration module resetting KYC records and IDs during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping required frontend feature work to specific files and components with test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated summaries of various frontend files describing their responsibilities and behaviors.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_TROUBLESHOOTING.md: Guide for building and deploying the app with steps for local and production environments and required environment variables.
frontend/docs/betting-topup-video-checkl: Checklist documenting all UI and logic requirements for implementing the betting top-up flow.
frontend/docs/crypto-wallet-dashboard-ch: Checklist detailing required UI sections and behaviors for the crypto wallet dashboard.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based CSS defining design tokens, theming variables, and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document that loads the frontend React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the main app layout and routing, handling authentication, profile setup modal logic, and all page routes.
frontend/src/backend-augment.d.ts: Augments the backend actor interface with an authorization initialization method for setting the first admin user.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminRoute: Checks if the caller is an admin and either shows restricted-access UI or renders protected children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginCard.t: Renders an Internet Identity login screen with a visual email/password form and info dialog triggers.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoAct: Displays a single crypto transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount, and status badge.
Loads and filters local crypto transactions, showing activity lists with tabs and skeleton states.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoDas: Shows a styled crypto dashboard header with balance visibility toggle and background artwork.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoQui: Provides quick-access action buttons for crypto operations like send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/components/crypto/CryptoTok: Lists crypto tokens with icons, balances, and click handling for selecting an asset.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Bu: Form sheet for selecting a crypto asset and USD amount to create a pending local 'buy' transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Re: Sheet for selecting a crypto asset, displaying a mock receive address, copying it, and logging a placeholder receive transaction.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Se: Form sheet to send crypto by selecting an asset, entering a destination address and amount, and creating a pending send transaction.
Multi‑step sheet for withdrawing funds to a bank account, including amount entry, payout method selection/creation, and withdrawal submission.
frontend/src/components/crypto/sheets/Sw: Sheet for swapping between two crypto assets using a mock rate and creating a pending swap transaction.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard promo card with text, illustration, and dot indicators, including fallback styling if the image fails.
Reusable dashboard tile with icon, label, optional badge, and click behavior, supporting disabled 'coming soon' states.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/GiftCa: Renders a selectable gift card brand row with an icon fallback and name label.
Displays up to a set number of tag badges with a counter for additional tags.
Provides UI to add, remove, and save custom gift card labels with save-state handling.
Implements a filter bar with searchable tag selection and options to toggle or clear filters.
Shows NGN rate tiers for a gift card brand in a table format.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/NGNRat: Displays an inline NGN rate summary or an unavailable notice based on matched tiers.
frontend/src/components/giftcards/Select: A bottom-sheet picker allowing users to search and select a gift card brand.
frontend/src/components/history/HistoryT: Renders a transaction row with icon, timestamp, amount formatting, and status badge.
Defines the main app layout with desktop sidebar, mobile header, navigation, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileBot: Provides a mobile bottom navigation dock with route-aware highlighting.
frontend/src/components/payout/NigerianB: Searchable dropdown component for selecting Nigerian banks with filtering and popover UI.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Modal for creating a user profile, handling name input, submission, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/services/BillCat: Clickable card UI tile displaying a bill category icon and label with keyboard support.
frontend/src/config/betting.ts: Defines betting providers list and preset amount chip values.
frontend/src/config/finance.ts: Provides conversion rate config and a function to compute gross, fee, and net values.
frontend/src/config/giftCardBrandCatalog: Catalog of gift card brands with search terms and icons, plus brand filtering utility.
frontend/src/config/giftCardRatesNGN.ts: Defines NGN gift card rate tables, brand overrides, and utilities for matching and formatting tiers.
frontend/src/config/nigerianBanks.ts: Contains a list of Nigerian banks and a helper to filter them by search query.
frontend/src/config/vendors.ts: Defines vendor payout configs and selects the best vendor based on net payout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to user identity and refreshes dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Re-exports hook for fetching the caller's user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useDashboardData.ts: Aggregates profile, KYC, cards, withdrawals, and transactions into a dashboard data object.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and identity loading from storage.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationPermis: Detects browser notification support, tracks permission state, and exposes a safe async permission request function.
frontend/src/hooks/useNotificationSettin: Manages per‑principal in‑app notification preference, syncing with localStorage and providing a toggle method.
frontend/src/hooks/useProfileSetupSuppre: Stores and retrieves per‑principal suppression of the profile setup prompt using localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks and mapping helpers for fetching and transforming backend user, KYC, payout, and withdrawal data.
frontend/src/hooks/useWalletSummary.ts: Fetches the caller’s profile and returns primary wallet balance, currency, and loading state.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with custom design tokens for light and dark themes plus global styles.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility functions for class merging, currency formatting across multiple currencies, and date formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entrypoint initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminKycReviewP: Allows admins to search users, review their KYC submissions, view documents, and update verification status.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWithdrawal: Admin page listing pending withdrawals with options to approve or reject each request and displaying processing states.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard UI displaying balance, shortcuts, and loading states, with toggling for balance visibility and navigation links.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/__tests__/a: Empty test file placeholder for NGN rate summary logic.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/addGiftCard: Exports a helper that parses an amount and computes the matched NGN rate tier for a given brand.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/AddGiftCard: Form for adding new gift cards with brand selection, rate tier computation, optional image upload, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardDet: Displays detailed info for a single gift card, including status, tags, and NGN rate table, with options to update status and labels.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/GiftCardsLi: Shows a filterable list of all gift cards with tag-based filtering and navigation to add or view cards.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/HottestCard: Ranks gift cards by their best NGN rate and displays them in a sortable, navigable grid.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/hottestCard: Computes and sorts gift cards by best NGN rate and provides utilities for rate extraction.
frontend/src/pages/giftcards/SellGiftCar: Allows selling a gift card by entering an amount, selecting a vendor, and viewing calculated conversion details.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Displays local transaction history, listens for updates, and renders a list or empty state with navigation back to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/KycPage.tsx: Fetches and submits KYC records, handles document upload with progress tracking, and displays current KYC status and submission form.
Form for purchasing airtime by selecting provider, entering phone and amount, and logging a local transaction.
A two-step betting top‑up form that collects provider, account ID, and amount, then logs a pending transaction.
frontend/src/pages/services/BillsPage.ts: Displays bill payment categories and navigates to specific service pages like airtime, data, electricity, and betting.
frontend/src/pages/services/CableTvBills: A placeholder cable TV payment form that logs a mock transaction using smartcard number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/CryptoWallet: Shows a crypto wallet dashboard with mock token data, quick actions, and modal sheets for send, receive, buy, swap, and bank transfer.
frontend/src/pages/services/DataPage.tsx: A placeholder mobile data purchase form that logs a mock transaction using phone number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/ElectricityP: A placeholder electricity bill payment form that logs a mock transaction using meter number and amount.
frontend/src/pages/services/WifiInternet: React page for logging placeholder internet bill payments, capturing account ID and amount, and storing them as local transactions.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Shows user authentication details and manages notification preferences using Internet Identity and browser notification permissions.
frontend/src/pages/withdrawals/Withdrawa: UI for viewing withdrawals, adding payout methods, and submitting withdrawal requests with currency selection and status handling.
frontend/src/state/localTransactions.ts: Manages local transaction storage with add, get, and clear helpers using localStorage and auto‑generated IDs.
frontend/src/state/notificationSettingsS: Handles per‑principal notification settings via scoped localStorage keys with safe get/set operations.
frontend/src/types/app-types.ts: Defines app-wide TypeScript types for users, wallets, transactions, gift cards, payout methods, withdrawals, and currency variants.
frontend/src/types/process-env.d.ts: Type declarations for process.env variables used by the frontend and shimmed by Vite.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, layout settings, and enabling several plugins.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite configuration enabling React, path aliases, env shims, build output settings, dev server proxying, and optimized deps.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state and requirements for implementing a full KYC verification workflow across frontend and backend. Lists existing features, new feature requests, and project metadata related to KYC data models, APIs, and UI updates.
